title: Crockpot Honey Sesame Chicken (with rice)
directions: In a large bowl, combine onion, honey, soy sauce, ketchup, vegetable oil, garlic, and red pepper. /p Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper to taste. Place chicken into a slow cooker. Add honey mixture and toss gently to combine. Cover and cook on low for 6 hours (if frozen) or 4 hours (if fresh or thawed) /p Remove chicken from slow cooker and shred before returning to pot. Let sit to meld flavors for 15minutes-1 hr on “low” or “keep warm”  /p Serve immediately over rice or noodles. Garnish with sesame seeds and green onion.  /p Calories 527/serving (if served with 1 cup of cooked white rice)
